info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davie and northeastern Iredell Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Yadkinville, or near Harmony, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Bermuda Run, Harmony, Fork Church, Olin, Sheffield, Farmington, Union Grove and Turnersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
